sentences.english: I. To unify your thoughts and always keep in mind the overall situation.
sentences.chinese: 统一思想，牢固树立大局意识。

sentences.english: Surface conduit and support should be fixed strongly and arranged into order.
sentences.chinese: 明配管及其支架应平滑牢固，排列整齐。

sentences.english: The bleak frost packed and paved the square as with some ringing metal.
sentences.chinese: 惨白的霜冻牢固地铺在广场上，象是铿锵发响的金属。

sentences.english: Keep any loose items clear of the table and chuck.
sentences.chinese: 把桌上和卡盘上任何的不牢固的物件移开。

sentences.english: I wish deep home firmly feudal autocratic parents and feudal thinking of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 祝家深厚牢固的封建家长专制和封建婚姻思想。

sentences.english: The goals acknowledge the strong two-way link between poverty and health.
sentences.chinese: 这些目标承认贫困与健康之间存在着牢固的双向联系。

sentences.english: Strong relationships with her children helped Melissa maintain her social ranking.
sentences.chinese: 与子女牢固的关系帮助梅丽莎维持她的高级社会地位。

sentences.english: By the end of the century, the men's ready-to-wear apparel industry was well established.
sentences.chinese: 到了该世纪末，男式成衣业已经牢固地建立起来了。

sentences.english: Eclipses test the strength of our resolve and of our relationships.
sentences.chinese: 日月食会检验我们的决心和关系的牢固程度。

sentences.english: Try to Remember idioms and sentences with the first calling, make sure to remember deeply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量用第一人称来记习惯用语和句型，以便记忆牢固。

sentences.english: Sturdily mount the clamping device of machine.
sentences.chinese: 研磨机夹持必须安装牢固。

sentences.english: The company established itself firmly in business.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司已在商界牢固地确立了自己的地位。

sentences.english: The benefits of physical activity are solidly-proven and well documented.
sentences.chinese: 体能活动的好处是牢固验证和有据可查的。

sentences.english: This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.chinese: 这个旋钮只是用通明胶带牢固住的。

sentences.english: The poor farmers do not have well - established claims to their land .
sentences.chinese: 贫穷的农民对土地的所有权还没有牢固确立。

sentences.english: The key to construct the harmonious campus is to firmly establish the principle that people are the foremost.
sentences.chinese: 建设和谐校园，核心是要牢固确立以人为本理念。

definition: loose/slack/(fig.) to soften (policies, tone of voice)/to give some slack/(of a place) not crowded
solid as a boulder (idiom); absolutely secure/rock-firm and unyielding
